storyInfo: Specter senses, having just concluded a trying battle, that she hasn't long before she falls into her maddened state once again. As she makes use of her short time awake, she has people she must meet, things she must say, and deeds she must do.

attributes.content: The scent.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Fluid without the scent of seawater. Foul nutritional fluid, or completely scentless distilled water. It maddens, drives mad.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The noise.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: There is no singing. There is no dancing. Only an endless, drawn-out clamoring remains. A horrific murmur, bringing craze.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's not all like that. Sometimes, in the momentarily returned quiet, there are voices to hear too. Clear voices.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...Is it 'I' who hears them? Not for sure. How should 'I' respond? Not important.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: This ragged, dilapidated body... here and now lacks, beyond maintaining silence, any use.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...Shark... no... Lauren... Laurentina!
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Don't rush, Skadi. You're far more familiar with her past than I am. But as for her present, you do not necessarily know her more thoroughly than I do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know you've been emotionally excited by the prospect of seeing one of your colleagues, but do not make contact with her. Her slumber is the product of tremendous effort.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Shark... Shark of the Second. It really is you.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You're still alive... I'm not the only Abyssal Hunter still alive...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Of course you're not.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I wandered dry land for so many years, and she was the first one I ever saw. Rhodes Island, exactly how did you find her?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: A deal, of no small cost, but thankfully enough for me to find out where the Church hid her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When we brought her back, she still held the last of her clarity, but very rapidly fell into confusion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Shark... can you not hear my voice? You should still remember me... no matter if it's me with you, or you with me, there's still so much for us to talk about.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: But in her conversations with us... while her confusion hasn't relapsed, she only calls herself 'Specter.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Specter?' She wasn't called that before. She's an Abyssal Hunter, one of the fiercest, cruelest 'executioners' of the Second...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: But she is presently Specter. Infected, has fled the Church of the Deep, and proclaims herself 'Specter.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Skadi, no matter her past, in her final waking moments, this is all as she told me. As to her capacity as an Abyssal Hunter, she mentioned not even a word.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why...?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Shark... no, Specter. She was taken away by a church on the land? They must have carried out so many cruel experiments on her.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: They wanted to learn the secrets... Specter's secrets, the Abyssal Hunters' secrets. And you...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Isn't that your reason too?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You know this is no easy topic. But exactly as per my attitude regarding you, the Abyssal Hunters' secrets are in no way the ultimate truth I seek to learn.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I regard Specter the same way. She is first and foremost my patient, and then one of Rhodes Island's personnel. As for anything prior—anything she hasn't mentioned before, I have no need to investigate deeper.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I want to ask... when she'll wake up.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Keeping an empty nest only wastes time. That miniscule chance of a miracle is not something you'd be willing to stop in your own tracks for.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We are sustaining her life. Her outlook is neutral; whether or not she can recover entirely depends on her. Here on dry land, this is all we can accomplish.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'll come back.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I want to meet her, speak with her, hear her singing. I've already... we've already been apart from our colleagues for far too long.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Your and her callings, significances at Rhodes Island are not the same. But provided she awakens, Skadi, she should be able to address your and my confusions alike.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I hope... we won't have to wait too long.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Somewhere outside Sal Viento
...Are we still hanging back, Captain? That's Skadi. She won't NOT find the way.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: No harm in waiting. She's more familiar with Rhodes Island's other operators.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I see now. Aaaaall you need is to make a deal with Dame Kal'tsit, and that's why she's the only one you got in touch with.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But I've been stuck in there for ages. There's so much that can take the same answer, and be done the same way.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The situation is provisionally stable, but not completely secured. When the time comes, either myself or Skadi will be confirming whether we can take you back.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hah. I'm not withered enough to collapse before I make it to Rhodes Island. Yet.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: On that note, Captain, do you have any idea what kind of place it is? They don't even have auto-flush smart toilets!
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: So I'm not aaaaall in a hurry to get back to that landship. Skadi's got her worries to settle, and we can chit-chat over ours.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Speak what you feel.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Saying this now might be way, way too late... But I can't help but say it. Captain, relax. I haven't leaked anything about us to anyone, not once, not ever.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Those Church idiots wanted to find our secrets. They tried prising open my mouth, digging the words out from inside my throat.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I wasn't willing. Then they went and thought to find any hint, whisper, indication from within my flesh, from inside my brain. But... you've seen where that got them.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: They never got their wish.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I saw. Were this the past, I would have to honor you... but at present, no one has the qualifications to do it for you, to officially and formally assess your conduct.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: No, Captain, you have those qualifications. Let's go back to the past for just a bit... we both have the memories to talk the talk.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Very well, then. Shark... your judgment was proper. You protected our secrets with your life. Very well done.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Heh... hah, hahah, that soothes me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Nothing else from me, Captain. I suppose you got to know everything going on with me all by yourself. It's a stupidly drier tale than what you've dealt with.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I just want to know, actually. If it's not you skittering everywhere by yourself, but rather 'us' now...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The Abyssal Hunters, back together again. What will we get up to, then?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: My mission has never changed. But, Shark, who are you now?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Those dry-landers aboard Rhodes Island all say it, let alone Dame Kal'tsit. Now, even Skadi calls you 'Specter.'
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: You have chosen to accept this identity, and have had no need to continue being 'Shark.'
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I'm still same as ever, Captain... I do something when I can do it. I have others to think about the rest for me. I'm Laurentina, I'm Shark, and I'm Specter.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Not a bad way to be.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: And is there nothing else? Captain, it's been so long since we saw each other, we've gone through so much. Why did it take so few words for us to become like we were before?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But you never did care about much. Same then, same now.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: There is something. But you have no need to recall it.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Something you want to know? What is it, then?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: When were you captured?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: On dry land. I broke free of those monsters, chased up onto shore, and while I was totally spent, those 'spirits' clasped me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: So... you ultimately know nothing of the remaining hunters who were dragged to the bottom of the sea.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Right. Everyone scattered.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Captain, if all that remains of the Abyssal Hunters are us three now...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Even so, we are still Abyssal Hunters. Our blood leaves us no escape from it.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: That's true, I knew you'd say something like that. Believe me, I wouldn't run from my mission.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Weird. Who in the hell's Skadi meeting for this long of a chat? Sal Viento's turned into a real wreck these days. Like there's anything to keep her here.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It seems of the Abyssal Hunters who walk on dry land, she has changed the most, and undertaken more besides.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Landwalkers' emotions, hah. It stuns me how accustomed she is to living out of water. And all the connections she's worked up.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Utterly meaningless. But to you, it is not a way of life necessarily ruled out, Shark.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I get it, I get it. If they really can figure out how to cure my case of bad-mouth, I'll reconsider my lifestyle.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But right now, my top priority is to reminisce, shoot the breeze.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: My weapon's duller than it was, my body's heavier than it used to be, and my reactions have slowed some too. If I'm going to be of real help to you, it'll take a bit more time.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: *sigh*... Forget it! Skadi's taking forever to come back anyway, so let's take a break. Oh, I'm dying to sing. Captain, who's going first?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Through all those mad, chaotic, inescapable days of pain, I would've gladly even given up my ability to fight, if only I could just sing.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But in the end, shock and horror, that was the one thing I somehow couldn't do.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's been too long... years, at this point. Does my throat still remember how to even hum? Let's try it and see.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.text: When she prayed♪
The stars ceased to shimmer♪
And when she wept♪
The night let out a smile♪

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Captain... Specter.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Done with your conversation?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yes. It's all sorted.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You and the landwalkers find so much to talk about. What are you teaching them? Are you telling them the ocean's knowledge, maybe passing on the dance and song?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's not important now... I didn't tell them any of that.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You're lying. Hahah, Skadi, you're lying to cover them! You care so much about them!
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I bet you've sung, or danced, or at least taught them how to scrounge up something edible from the shore, like what the Ægir of the sea would eat...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Shark.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I've been dying to report it to you, Captain. Skadi's changed massively. She keeps coming to my room, singing songs, telling stories.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The uptight little idiot, laying the tragedy of that entire disaster all on herself. All because she fought the Ægir's miserable destiny head-to-head?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'm not.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Let's go, Skadi. She's spent too long not talking. She won't stop now.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Of course, I've got so much more I want to say. But I can let you have the first word, Skadi. When I can't open my eyes, or move my body, I can still hear your voice. You've asked me leagues of questions.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Some of them... are no longer important.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Some truths have already been revealed.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: As for you... Specter, I have thought of asking you before. But I should not expose those emotions to you... at least, right now I shouldn't.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Not like it matters much. If you think of anything at all, talk to me, no holds barred, Skadi. But...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...I recommend you do it before the dark descends once more... the 'spirits' still have life...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter, did you just...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Tch. Nothing major. Just a godawful old habit.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Really? If those ideas that maddened you are polluting your thoughts once again, then we have to hurry back immediately.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: What use would hurrying back be? Medical systems on dry land do absolutely nothing for me. They keep me alive, and that's it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Regardless, pick up the pace.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Shark, Skadi. Our time is not so plentiful.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hahah. Skadi, is this what you're thinking? Three estranged, adrift old friends are back together again, but we get something so simple and perfunctory for it?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: No. I only wanted to confirm the actual situation.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Hah, 'actual.' What's the point? Abyssal Hunters only communicate what they need to know with each other. This is how we have always been, fundamentally.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's started up again... inside my head, within my spine, something's stirring outwards. It hurts...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It took so much to break out... and now I'm right back on the way to madness. Hahah, what else can I even do? In this hellish state, do I have anything worth doing?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Mm... right... what can I get done?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Fighting. Right, that's the one.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Sawing a thing or two apart is what I'm best at. Something I can do no matter my state.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Even if I fall into darkness once more, I can still rely on this... as proof of myself. I fight. So I am Specter, I am Shark, I am Laurentina. There'll be those who remember me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Northern Iberia
If we go by Dame Kal'tsit's plans, our support should be right here, right now. Misery, was that the name?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But I don't see one single person who looks like Rhodes Island. How'd this happen?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Do you copy? Skadi, Specter, and Lady Gladiia.
attributes.name: Liaison Operator

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I'm with Misery's squad.
attributes.name: Liaison Operator

attributes.content: The fact that we made contact means we can't be far from each other. We're very sorry we didn't show up at the appointed position, but Rhodes Island's Iberia field team has run into some trouble.
attributes.name: Liaison Operator

attributes.content: Dame Kal'tsit isn't one to allow such error under her control.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Undoubtedly. This accident was beyond her plans. There was an ambush, and we can't confirm the Rhodes Island team's status... to borrow your words, it's one of those 'pains of dry land.'
attributes.name: Liaison Operator

attributes.content: Captain Misery says once it's sorted out, we'll rendezvous.
attributes.name: Liaison Operator

attributes.content: How long will it take?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hmm... two hours, if we rush over. We're the closest to you.
attributes.name: Liaison Operator

attributes.content: We're going to sit here and wait? Unacceptable. Captain, why don't we just—
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: This is not an operation we have any choice in. I and Rhodes Island have not formally established cooperation yet.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah... Skadi, what do you think? How would the Rhodes Island operator in you take it?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: With... the lift of a finger.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Great minds think alike.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Your attitudes towards the people on dry land have come to resemble each other.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Then give it a go, Captain, join in the fun. We've all got the same objective, anyhow. If it gets us back to Rhodes Island sooner, what's the harm in helping a little along the way?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Also, how long has it been since we last fought together? That battle just now could hardly scratch the itch.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Even if... Fine, I can imagine facing off with land idiots won't take much effort. It probably wouldn't even leave the slightest wound.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You two. One only ever says what she has to, the other skirts and sidesteps and never wants to say what's weighing on her mind. You suffocate me, both of you.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Forget it, I'm making the call! Rhodes Island, heads up, we'll come and provide support. We'll clean up the battlefield faster that way.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: From what Dame Kal'tsit told us, you three have been through a fierce battle. Are you going to go jump straight into a new one?
attributes.name: Liaison Operator

attributes.content: Hah, it's only a bit of a wake-up for us. She could never hold sway over our choices. And say what you like, our verdict's unanimous.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: —I need to confirm, this is a sign you're willing to provide us assistance?
attributes.name: Liaison Operator

attributes.content: It'll only be the lift of a finger.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I have no interest in aiding any wave of landwalkers. I am even antipathic. However, nor will I have any guilt in destroying the other wave.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Our stance is very clear, Rhodes Islanders.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: There's no time... Ah, the lure of the darkness, it encroaches step by step.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Oh, 'Sister,' heed my command, respond to my hope, scatter the true essence of my mind forth...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Hk—*cough*, *hack*... stop!
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter? It's happening again, you're...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: No... hah... hahah... don't you pity me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'm not... I'm just worried.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I know what you're afraid of... Skadi. The hourglass really is flowing far too fast... but I can still hold on.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But forget any of that... we're the survivors. We've got so much we can take our time with, talk about...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: It's not the time to talk about any of that. And besides, we're Abyssal Hunters, Skadi. Sharing our experiences might be exciting, but it's not quite the point.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Just like before, Abyssal Hunters' communication—comes through song and battle. That's the most important thing.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Captain, you don't pay much mind in battle, do you?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Right. If you say you're fine, I will not ask further.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: That's the ticket. Let's go. Let me fight sober once again... it's been long, this self-determined joy.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: *cough*... hrgh—*cough*...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Are you alright there, Specter?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: (Waves hand)
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You're already... in terrible shape. Where are you going now?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Heheh... where am I headed... right. Before time's up, I still have to hand in that holiday assignment you arranged for me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You had me receive those 'kindnesses' for the landwalkers' Christmas. Apart from a cut-and-bone-dry gift... don't tell me you weren't meaning for me to gain some other, extra sentiments?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I had no other motive... I just didn't want you to miss it.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Hah, the others don't know what you used to be like... but me and the Captain know who you really are.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You've changed too much, Skadi. Your heart... is much too soft—even a landwalker can warm it. That's why you tried to return the favor.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Then what about you? You were snatched away by the Church... and rescued by Rhodes Island, and now you've united with your colleagues once again. How do you look upon this dry land?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Me? Hm... Aside from revulsion, contempt and ridicule for those Church plankton worshipping the sea, I've never had much serious talk with the people of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You know, they have no idea how to take in what I say, and they'd never understand Ægir life. They wouldn't have the first clue about the simple tools we use every day.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Rhodes Island? In terms of living life... it's a pain, a pain in the ass!
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I won't argue that.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: But there are places where their hearts and ours might agree.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yes... vast creation's master, in the darkness, spies on it all alike...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It seeks, it coaxes... it will herein once again descend... ugh...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter, can you... still walk?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: (...I don't have much time.)
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Forget it. Let's drop it, Skadi, we talked enough on the way back, and I've still got a few things I need to see through.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Also... those 'never met,' or those landwalkers I've only seen once. I guess I should meet them one last time, in the end.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: If you need me to help, then.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Hah, don't bother. With two Abyssal Hunters walking side by side, how would those landbound asses not piss themselves in awe?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'll leave the very last of my strength for the idiots of the land... however many I can meet... will be however many who can remember me. Ah, but what's the goddamned point?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: In the end, it's like Dame Kal'tsit says. It's only 'cause I'm needed that I'm still here, alive.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Or maybe... hm.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Dame Kal'tsit mentioned it. How I had those 'new friends.'
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Friends? The land people...? Hah.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: In any case, if I don't meet them in person, greet them directly, then I'll never know peace.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Off I go.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yes... Off you go.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You'll wake once again, Specter... I'll be there then.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Don't beat yourself up so much. Skadi, quit frowning, I've never blamed you, not even once.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I know... I really do know.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Smile! I've accepted how I'm powerless to wake up. It's about time you accept your own past and present.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: If I really do awaken again, when you see me, let's chat about the more interesting things in life.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yo, you guys are back early.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Why'd you only call me? I thought the info Captain Gladiia or Skadi brought back would be more important.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: That's 'stuff for after' important. To Rhodes Island, getting you checked out and treated is more important at the moment. We deliberated on it, and that's the call.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Of course, Kal'tsit's warned us about it a million times too.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Don't you care about her...?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Kal'tsit? That was her own decision. Besides, how do you know if she told me things would turn out this way?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: All these little schemes you landwalkers have really lose themselves in the details. Bo-ring.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Majorly glad to see you with the gift of gab, Specter. Misery told me how you three Abyssal Hunters helped a Rhodes Island field team out of a pinch.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Me and Skadi are registered, after all, and the other one'll be right on her way in to report.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: So... how do you feel?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We need to run an evaluation on your combat strength.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If you can hold onto your clear mind and run some combat in order against a team, we'll be real happy to draw you up some mission arrangements again.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hah. Your 'tests' really are far too simple, then. What makes that bunch of goons worth three Abyssal Hunters taking them on at once?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: When we got there, Misery already saved the show, more or less.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Dull like nothing else. I'd even take that damned mutant bishop. Oh, shame it's already dead.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It was I who personally returned it to the darkness... such darkness, a darkness still behind me, pursuing me...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Hah... hahah... who could ever escape... the thirst to be one again with we many...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter? You still holding up there?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ugh... not too well. But probably.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Your nervous system's getting attacked hard, and quicker than I expected. Let's get your examination on the road now...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No... I'll just be back on that bed in the end, either way. I want to make use of this time. I still have my own things I want to do.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Knew it... Kal'tsit told me, don't force you to stop... she was able to figure your current state and choices.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But still, Rhodes Island's got a few questions for you.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hah, then you'll need to be quick.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: How much longer will you be awake?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Couldn't say... my head's all hazy dazy. I might have about fifty percent consciousness?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Alright. I hope we can get everything out of you with these statements, and Rhodes Island will do all we can to respect your wishes.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Specter, when you first came to Rhodes Island, you did not make it in time to convey the message you wanted. Do you intend on conveying it now?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: There's no need... Closure, is that what they call you? What I needed to convey, my colleagues have already come to learn.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: As for the leftovers, though... I won't allow those strains that the church pawns planted in my will to flower, to spread those obscenities to places farther, wider still.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Alright. Next up, Rhodes Island took you in for treatment, and then with great caution sent you into field combat. Do you consider...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I know all that. It was my own choice to fight. Dame Kal'tsit figured out that much, and I still need to give her a little thanks for that.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The battlefield... is a peaceful place. At times, the silent ruins are much quieter than all that medical equipment, constantly whirring away.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: If, and I mean if, Specter, regarding recovery of your awareness... if we find a way to maintain your waking state to a certain degree, do you have any plans made for your future?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Plans? I've long since had those ready.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I was thinking about them on the trip back, even.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Why not invite the Captain and Skadi to form a team of three with me, go outside just for a spot of slaughter, and bully your useless land-dwelling punk idiots a little.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Skadi says after so long walking on land, she can tell apart the 'good' and the 'bad' in your hearts. With the Captain leading, we three are a complete army.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: For sure, if we consider what we know of the Abyssal Hunters' strength...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: However, I haven't told them any of that.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Dame Kal'tsit's warned me, and I've had inklings myself. This sanity is something that can't last for long.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: A three-person team fails at the planning stage. My combat style is already totally unlike how it used to be. Rhodes Island, the tactics you currently choose for me seem to be the most optimal.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Before we can find a way to treat you...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Forget it. All this dry-land technology of yours could only ever give me occasional peace.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The faults in my body... only I myself can sort them out. Anyone else? Hopeless.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Hey, now, don't look like that, Closure. All I can do is remain at Rhodes Island. I count as one of you. When I want to hack someone apart, let me out to war, and it'll be a win for you too.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: So, are you able to accept continued combat as a Rhodes Island Operator?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I told you, the battlefield is where I can find some peace and quiet inside my head. I can't work like I did as an Abyssal Hunter anymore, but aboard Rhodes Island, there are those who let me revel in the fighting front.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: So you mean to say, our commander gives you effective instruction?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: In fact, once I'm done with you, that is where I plan to go.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: We've never talked while I was awake. I've got a few things I need to explain, quickly.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's commander—the Doctor, is nothing like any of you.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You can tell.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: When language can't reach, all the other senses become stronger as a result. If I want to continue fighting...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I must... bring the Doctor... to that place...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: ...*hiss*. I can't stop now, or else the darkness will catch me up.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I need to go.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.text: Specter runs... no, it more resembles a wandering onto dry land.
That mad chatter echoes, eating away at her nerves.
There's not a moment when the high-concentration liquid Originium poured into her spinal cord isn't repelling, invading her body, restored by Specter's own cells afterwards.
The flesh can still persist, but the spirit is not the same.
The Church used crueler, more wicked means than all to utterly perturb her thought.
Outside the true Laurentina, wraps 'Specter.'
Laurentina... and Specter at the same time. It has taken time endless, but in the end, she chooses to accept it whole.
The fact she no longer tears at her nun's clothing tells it all.

attributes.content: Ah... ah... I've found you...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Good day... Doctor...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.options: Specter... you're back safe.;Specter.;Are you alright?

attributes.content: Heheh. This is my first time talking to you awake...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yes... awake. I am still awake right now, but I am also... somewhat fatigued.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Relax, Doctor. You are already used to this sort of conversation with me. Now, you may understand me even better.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.options: There's so much I want to ask you.;What are you willing to tell me?

attributes.content: Doctor... you have seen me before as I washed about, spoken with me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: If there were words then that you could not comprehend, do not... do not heed them.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Those madnesses should not be passed on, but it is beyond me to control it. Fortunately, I still have the right to silence.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.options: I'll hear you out, Specter.;You need to say it. You want to speak.;I can take it.

attributes.content: Heheh, Doctor, there are so few who should be willing to try.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: My one regret is, in that form, I am unable to sing. And I... the I of now, no longer have the voice for song...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Doctor... I will sing you a song.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I must sing it. And then... you have... some kind of power. I believe, after you hear this, you may be able to understand.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Doctor, I have met my colleagues. My captain... as Abyssal Hunters, we endured selection of the prime, elimination of the unfit, uncountable times.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Gladiia once commanded us to jointly resist that terrifying enemy... the darkness from within the ocean. She remains the same even now.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But I. I am the name 'Shark,' yet have become 'Specter.' Akin with Skadi, we carry the odor of dry land. We carry the scent Rhodes Island carries.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Doctor, in the times I cannot maintain wakefulness, I cannot swim together with my captain... my body has been implanted with makings of dry land, and I am forced only to crawl across this world.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I thirst, thirst to stand upon the battlefield, thirst to enter the sea, thirst to sing.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You are the tactical commander... on the battlefield, you know, the way in which I fight. Do not let me leave the battlefield for too long. That is my... evidence, that I live after others die.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Put even more danger upon my share.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Then let me a little closer to the enemy. Do not worry, Doctor, I'll be more obedient on the battlefield than ever before.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Do not fear my strength... simply keep far from me, what you do not want my saw to cut.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Fundamentally, an Abyssal Hunter's battle needs no surplus communication.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Worry not, Doctor. Break us in for a bit longer, and we will only become more familiar with each other, and the bindings of language... will have no meaning at all to fighters like us.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Should I trust you, commander of dry land?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: To allow me to fight like an Abyssal Hunter, allow me to fight more and more... so that my faint consciousness returns to these hands of mine, power overflowing, weapon in their grasp?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...Heh, heheh, hahahah...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Observe, Doctor, I still have so many 'secrets,' and I will be sure to tell them to you, before you go to that place...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But now, but now, just what ought I do...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Sing... yes, sing.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.text: When she prayed♪
The stars ceased to shimmer♪
Specter seems utterly content with the scene before her. She breaks into a laugh, and serenely laughs away.
Humming those old, mysterious refrains, a body on the waves leaves the Doctor's sight.
And when she wept♪
The night let out a smile♪

attributes.content: This... Specter can sing.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Specter?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: And when she wept♪
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The night let out a smile♪
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter... Laurentina, stand still.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: A colleague's scent... oh...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter, can... you hear me speak? Specter—
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Don't touch... me...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You have not... undergone baptism... return your filth to the ocean... the breath of dry land repels you... seduces you...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Hahh... I hear your call... hahh... the edge of the darkness...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.text: The hunter Skadi silently follows behind her, a distance left between them.
Set in her walk forwards, Specter does not heed her again.
In spells, she mutters to herself, then sings out loud, fully complacent reveling in her madness—in the tranquility within.
Skadi thinks, at the very least, she once again knows how to sing.
And as she lamented♪
The anguish sprawled upon her madness♪
And as she lamented♪
The anguish sprawled upon her madness♪
